alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Towns; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Towns, Union and northeastern Fannin Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 801 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Hot House, or 8 miles east of Ducktown, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blue Ridge, Blairsville, Young Harris, Morganton, Hemp, Gumlog, Nottely Dam, Hurst, Ivy Log, Loving, Jones Creek, Woods Hole Shelter, Epworth, Owltown, Mineral Bluff, Vogel State Park, Track Rock, Blood Mountain Shelter and Alexanders Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
